subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills released linebacker Jeff Posey yesterday after he lost his starting job to Angelo Crowell. Posey, an eight-year veteran, was a starter for three seasons with the Bills. Crowell, a three-year veteran, is coming off an impressive season after he filled in as a starter in place of Takeo Spikes.
